title: Worlds 2017 legends EMOTE permanent ?
body:
just wanted to know if the new Worlds 2017 legends Emote will be permanent like the team emotes ?
Thank you for your time !

replies.body: Yep! I double checked with a few other people just to make sure, but it seems like they're going to be permanent and should be made into the new Emotes when they're fully released in all regions.
thank you !! going to get it for myself along with Championship zed !!
